name: microsoft-advanced-threat-analytics
label: Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics
description: Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics (ATA) is an on-premises platform that helps protect your enterprise from multiple types of advanced targeted cyber attacks and insider threats.

fields.name: url
fields.title: Server URL
fields.tooltip: Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics server URL. e.g., https://atacenter.contoso.com
fields.description: Specify the Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics server URL to connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.name: username
fields.title: Username
fields.tooltip: Username for the Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics.
fields.description: Specify the Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics username to connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.name: password
fields.title: Password
fields.tooltip: Password for the Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics.
fields.description: Specify the Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics password to connect and perform the automated operations..

fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified.
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. 
By default, this option is set to True.

operations.title: Get Suspicious Activities List
operations.description: Retrieves the suspicious activities by the activity ID, status, severity from Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics.

parameters.name: activity_id
parameters.title: Suspicious Activity ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the suspicious activity.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the suspicious activity to retrieve.

operations.title: Set Suspicious Activity Status
operations.description: Sets status of suspicious activity by the activity ID, status in Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics.

parameters.name: activity_id
parameters.title: Suspicious Activity ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the suspicious activity.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the suspicious activity whose status needs to be updated.

parameters.name: status
parameters.title: Status
parameters.tooltip: Specify the status of the suspicious activity. e.g., Open, Closed, Suppressed
parameters.description: Specify the status of the suspicious activity. e.g., Open, Closed, Suppressed

operations.title: Get Monitoring Alerts List
operations.description: Retrieves the monitoring alerts from Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics.

operations.title: Get Entity
operations.description: Retrieves the information of specific entity from Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics.

parameters.name: entity_id
parameters.title: Entity ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the entity.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the entity to retrieve from Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics.
